page.title: 08MRS.BOVILL'S DAY
page.content: Mrs Bovill lives at Woodham Mortimer Grange.She rises at 7 and cooks her husbands breakfast.This consists of eggs,bacon,sausages,tomatoes and mushrooms.When husband leaves home in his Volvo Mrs Bovill does the housework helped by two ladies from adjacent cottages owned by the Bovills The 5 cairn terriers are then walked. Shopping is done in Maldon twice a week and once a week Mrs Bovill helps handicapped people.She also helps with the Church flowers.Sometimes at lunch or dinner overseas visitors,connected with her husbands business,are entertained.Mrs Bovill always dresses for dinner which is at 8.15pm.After dinner which is usually soup and a meat dish she watches T.V.or reads,usually autobiographies.On birthdays and anniversaries she always dines out.
